metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9637 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in PHP before 7.1.27, 7.2.x before 7.2.16, and7.3.x before 7.3.3. Due to the way rename() across filesystems isimplemented, it is possible that file being renamed is briefly availablewith wrong permissions while the rename is ongoing, thus enablingunauthorized users to access the data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9637` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.2 - 7.2.15-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
libphp7.2-embed - 7.2.15-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
php7.2 - 7.2.15-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
php7.2-bcmath - 7.2.15-0ubuntu0.18.04.2

criterions.comment: php7.2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.2.15-0ubuntu0.18.04.2').
